content.rendered:
FACILITIES & EXPERIENCES

State of the art hotel facilities and services complement Caravelle Saigon’s gracious Vietnamese hospitality. Our guests travelling to Saigon/Ho Chi Minh City on business and leisure are catered to in our fully equipped business centre and Signature Lounge, while the concierge team arranges seamless tours of Saigon and transfers in our fleet of luxury limousines. Fitness and wellness enthusiasts have access to the private Kara Spa overlooking Lam Son Square in the centre of Saigon, 24-hour fitness centre access plus private outdoor swimming pool and bar.
